item.title:

item.title:
Jonah Hauer-King has written a script about prisoners of war during WWII who start theater companies and stage plays to explore “their ways of finding some purpose and meaning in their lives.”
The film is currently in pre-production.
(https://thecut.com/2023/05/jonah-hauer-king-prince-eric-little-mermaid-interview.html…)
